‚ä¢ Eq (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp ((CategoryTheory.MonoidalCategoryStruct.tensorHom f g).app j) (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (CategoryTheory.ChosenFiniteProducts.fst (F‚ÇÅ'.obj j) (F‚ÇÇ'.obj j)) h)) (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (CategoryTheory.ChosenFiniteProducts.fst (F‚ÇÅ.obj j) (F‚ÇÇ.obj j)) (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (f.app j) h))
decl:
@[reassoc (attr := simp)]
lemma tensorHom_app_fst {F‚ÇÅ F‚ÇÅ' F‚ÇÇ F‚ÇÇ' : J ‚•§ C} (f : F‚ÇÅ ‚ü∂ F‚ÇÅ') (g : F‚ÇÇ ‚ü∂ F‚ÇÇ') (j : J) :

  rw [‚Üê NatTrans.comp_app, tensorHom_fst, NatTrans.comp_app]

      rw [‚Üê NatTrans.comp_app, ‚Üê NatTrans.comp_app, assoc, associator_hom_snd_fst, assoc]
